biography: Olli, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a unique blend of skill and enthusiasm to the competition. Representing Hirsala Golf, Olli is known for his meticulous approach to the game and his unwavering dedication to improvement. Off the course, he is known for his analytical mind and keen interest in the scientific aspects of golf, making him a dedicated fan of Bryson.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli has proven himself to be a formidable competitor. His experience in both the individual and pair formats makes him a valuable asset to any team. Olli has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once and has also claimed the Victor Trophy, underscoring his individual prowess.

As he prepares for his ninth appearance at Hector Trophée 2025, Olli aims to leverage his experience and refined skills to pursue further success in the tournament. His consistent performance and strategic mindset make him one to watch.
